attributes.title: The Mechs Generation Episode 1 - "The Year of the Dog"
attributes.caption: Heroes & Halfwits is re-imagined! Meet the new cast of characters, and follow them as a routine day in high school goes completely awry when they meet a big talking spider, a pyromaniac, and a special (maybe delicious) dog.
attributes.description: Heroes & Halfwits is re-imagined! Meet the new cast of characters, and follow them as a routine day in high school goes completely awry when they meet a big talking spider, a pyromaniac, and a special (maybe delicious) dog. This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron (http://cook.ba/HandHBlueApron) and MVMT (http://bit.ly/2kaRZMr).
attributes.display_title: 2018:E41 - The Mechs Generation Episode 1 - "The Year of the Dog"

attributes.title: The Mechs Generation Episode 2 - "The Year of the Dog: Part II"
attributes.caption: The kids are (maybe) alright...if they can just figure out whether to steal or buy party supplies for Popular Guy Mike's party, what their teenage morality is, and if they really will help Tib in his quest.
attributes.description: Get the audio version at http://bit.ly/2H2seYt. attributes.title: The Mechs Generation Episode 3 - Fathers and Errant Children: Part I
attributes.caption: The term "star-crossed" love takes on new meaning for Thimbledick. Tib has some valuable life advice for Kneebone. The students of the Groening Academy for Young People go on a field trip. Some of the kids experience psykopylae travel for the first time a
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2JTheeu. The term "star-crossed" love takes on new meaning for Thimbledick. Tib has some valuable life advice for Kneebone. The students of the Groening Academy for Young People go on a field trip. Some of the kids experience psykopylae travel for the first time and discover a new appreciation of apples and oranges. This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron (http://cook.ba/HandHBlueApron) and MVMT (http://bit.ly/2kaRZMr)
attributes.display_title: 2018:E43 - The Mechs Generation Episode 3 - Fathers and Errant Children: Part I

attributes.title: The Mechs Generation Episode 4 - Fathers and Errant Children: Part II
attributes.caption: The kids and Io find themselves at the center of a sinister Martian conspiracy. That doesn't stop them from taking the time to get some ink done though.

attributes.title: The Mechs Generation Episode 5 - Fathers and Errant Children: Part III
attributes.caption: Rand discovers an important detail about his past and reacts in a very Rand sort of way. The crew learn about a sinister conspiracy. Later, they get offered a new job opportunity. And a tour guide educates the party about a famous Swedish explorer.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2L4x6eQ. Rand discovers an important detail about his past and reacts in a very Rand sort of way. The crew learn about a sinister conspiracy. Later, they get offered a new job opportunity. And a tour guide educates the party about the famous Swedish explorer Fardarfensnarven. This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron (http://cook.ba/HandHBlueApron) and MVMT (http://bit.ly/2kaRZMr)

attributes.title: The Mechs Generation - Episode 8: Dinosaurs With Guns: Part II
attributes.caption: The party undergo mech combat training on their way to the planet of TreValle. In orbit over the dinosaur sanctuary, they receive a stern warning. Down on the planet, they get to mechin' and trekkin'!

attributes.title: The Mechs Generation - Episode 10X: Dinosaurs With Guns: Part V
attributes.caption: Straight from RTX 2018 in Austin, this very special (and very chaotic) episode was filmed live at the H&H panel! Find out what happens to the party moments after the cliffhanger at the end of Season 4 as they struggle to cope with their new circumstances.
attributes.description: Straight from RTX 2018 in Austin, this very special (and very chaotic) episode was filmed live at the H&H panel! Find out what happens to the party moments after the cliffhanger at the end of Season 4 as they struggle to cope with their new circumstances. Be wary of strange 20-sided dice!
